properties.entry: I am going offline now. I will be back as soon as possible.
I am a little bot who helps you coordinate your Discord guild better! Specifically, I have been designed to assist guilds who play the mobile game "Deep Town".
The user database is up to date.

This bot was created by BlackCraze, with help from Dangercrow and firewaran. Greek translations by ThatGreekGuy. Portuguese translations by Benur21. Documentation assistance by PellaAndroid. i18n coordination by PellaAndroid.
Codebase: https://github.com/BlackCraze/GameResourceBot/
Discord server (for developers and users): https://discord.gg/e77yjxj
